title: Why is Brandon Sanderson famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you ment what is he famous for, I would awnser for being a good writer. He also gained quite the recognition when he finished the late Robert Jordans “The weel of time” series. He has won several literary awards; the latest one being the David Gemmell Legend Award for his book Words of Radiance in 2015. For more info about him visit his homepage brandonsanderson.com
Because his books are amazing. I have just read the mistborn series but he has become one of my favorite authors.
